title: Bloomberg Markets: Spaces Offering Dynamic Work Areas

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Martijn Roordink Co-Founder and Managing Director Spaces Discussing the disruption of real estate and humanizing the workplace with co-working spaces.
